channel.title: Dfs on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Dfs on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 1367 Linked List in Binary Tree
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem Question Given a binary tree root and a linked list with head as the first node.

item.title: Problem 947 Most Stones Removed With Same Row or Column
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 947 Question On a 2D plane, we place n stones at some integer coordinate points.

item.title: Problem 1905 Count Sub Islands
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1905 Question You are given two m x n binary matrices grid1 and grid2 containing only 0’s (representing water) and 1’s (representing land).

item.title: Problem 230 Kth Smallest Element in a BST
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 230 Question Given the root of a binary search tree, and an integer k, return the kth smallest value (1-indexed) of all the values of the nodes in the tree.

item.title: Problem 1530 Number of Good Leaf Nodes Pairs
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1530 Question You are given the root of a binary tree and an integer distance.

item.title: Problem 1110 Delete Nodes and Return Forest
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1110 Question Given the root of a binary tree, each node in the tree has a distinct value.

item.title: Problem 2096 Step by Step Directions From a Binary Tree Node to Another
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2096 Question You are given the root of a binary tree with n nodes.

item.title: Problem 2192 All Ancestors of a Node in a DAG
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2192 Question You are given a positive integer n representing the number of nodes of a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG).

item.title: Problem 979 Distribute Coins in Binary Tree
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 979 Question You are given the root of a binary tree with n nodes where each node in the tree has node.

item.title: Problem 1325 Delete Leaves With a Given Value
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1325 Question Given a binary tree root and an integer target, delete all the leaf nodes with value target.

item.title: Problem 2331 Evaluate Boolean Binary Tree
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2331 Question You are given the root of a full binary tree with the following properties:

item.title: Problem 1219 Path With Maximum Gold
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1219 Question In a gold mine grid of size m x n, each cell in this mine has an integer representing the amount of gold in that cell, 0 if it is empty.

item.title: Problem 1971 Find if Path Exists in Graph
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1971 Question There is a bi-directional graph with n vertices, where each vertex is labeled from 0 to n-1 (inclusive).

item.title: Problem 1992 Find All Groups of Farmland
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1992 Question You are given a 0-indexed m x n binary matrix land where a 0 represents a hectare of forested land and a 1 represents a hectare of farmland.

item.title: Problem 200 Number of Islands
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 200 Question Given an m x n 2D binary grid grid which represents a map of '1's (land) and '0's (water), return the number of islands.

item.title: Problem 988 Smallest String Starting From Leaf
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 988 Question You are given the root of a binary tree where each node has a value in the range [0, 25] representing the letters 'a' to 'z'.

item.title: Problem 623 Add One Row to Tree
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 623 Question Given the root of a binary tree and two integers val and depth, add a row of nodes with value val at the given depth depth.

item.title: Problem 129 Sum Root to Leaf Numbers
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 129 Question You are given the root of a binary tree containing digits from 0 to 9 only.
